initiate verb [T]
(TEACH)
to teach someone about an area of knowledge, or to allow someone into a group by a special ceremony: be initiated into At the age of eleven, Harry was initiated into the art of golf by his father.initiate someone into something Each culture had a special ritual to initiate boys into manhood.
